text.div:
EncounterIdSearchParameter

Parameter _id:token

Searches based on the Encounter uuid field for the Encounter record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}}/Encounter?_id={uuid}

ResourceEncounter
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesEncounter
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: EncounterIdSearchParameter
description: Searches based on the Encounter uuid field for the Encounter record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}}/Encounter?_id={uuid}
